title: OH NO!

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Pick a faction before the game starts. You get the abilities of two random roles from that faction. Your defense is equal to that of the first role you randomly got.
- When 5 or fewer players remain at the start of any given day, you lose your copied abilities. The town is then informed that they must vote up the OH NO! today or they will all lose to you. **OH NO!**
**Goal**: Win with an OH NO!. You automatically win with whoever's remaining if there are two or fewer players remaining at the start of any given day.

desc:
Post 4334
*Told you so*
*You gotta go*
*Oh no, oh no, oh noooo*
